goal.en: Introducing research ideas and topics in the physics of complex systems.
goal.ch: Introducing research ideas and topics in the physics of complex systems.

content.en:
1. Introduction
2. bifurcation and patterns
3. active motion
4. self-organized criticality
5. power laws
6. networks
content.ch:
1. Introduction
2. bifurcation and patterns
3. active motion
4. self-organized criticality
5. power laws
6. networks

textbook.en: 1. From cells to societies, Mikhailov, Springer Verlag 2. When things grow many by Shulman, Oxford Univ Press 3. Introduction to complex systems, Bertin, Springer
textbook.ch: 1. From cells to societies, Mikhailov, Springer Verlag 2. When things grow many by Shulman, Oxford Univ Press 4. Introduction to complex systems, Bertin, Springer

method.ch: 講授 研討 個別指導

domain.en: 共同物理課程 、 凝態與半導體物理 、 複雜系統，軟物質與生物物理
